name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-msgext-action-preview-python
title: Action based Messaging Extension with preview using Bot Framework v4
shortDescription: This sample app demonstrates an Action-Based Messaging Extension for Microsoft Teams.
longDescription: This sample showcases how to create an Action-Based Messaging Extension in Microsoft Teams, allowing users to generate a card from Task Module inputs. It includes features such as bots, message extensions, and interaction capabilities for a seamless user experience.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing Action based Messaging Extension with preview using Bot Framework v4

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
